executable.title: Prostate Segmentation SB
executable.description: This filter creates a binary image that separates the prostate from other tissues on MRI images using a shape-based method.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NA-MIC Driving Biological Problems (DBP) Core 3.2.

point.label: Prostate side points
point.description: A point on the left and the right side of the prostate on an axial slice, near the center of the prostate.

double.name: threshold
double.description: Control the segmentation threshold. Increase value to grow the segmented area.
